name: Super Impact
description:
After air combat, you ground on the same island as your rival that you must trap and strike to get rid of him.

It's a game based on strategy and quick reactions.
Each player begins with 3 hit points and must use items that appear on the map to defeat his opponent. Items include shields, bomb and turbo

Key features

  • Fighting, Action, Strategy
  • Endless challenge
  • Skill based
  • Fast paced
  • Instinctive
  • Simple yet deep

Spread the word.

You can find my other games on http://visumeca.com
